Mix blood sample.sentence: The technician collects the blood sample from the patient.
Mix blood sample.subject: The technician

Mix blood sample.sentence: The technician labels the blood sample with the patient's information.
Mix blood sample.subject: The technician

Mix blood sample.sentence: The technician places the blood sample into a centrifuge.
Mix blood sample.subject: The technician

Mix blood sample.sentence: The technician sets the centrifuge to the appropriate speed and time for mixing.
Mix blood sample.subject: The technician

Mix blood sample.sentence: The technician retrieves the mixed blood sample after centrifugation is complete.
Mix blood sample.subject: The technician
